replies.body: I've spoken to Marauder about some other topics and he said that the boards community needs to expand and have a bigger user base. With that comment I would assume there aren't enough people and or consistent board posters to create such a list. In the past however there have been a couple board/forum tier lists but any on the boards have since been removed.

Hello Mr Trash,

I have recently rejoined the boards, I love discussing strategy and to be helpful where I can?

- Skyprus
Sure, feel free to add me.

trash tier: justtrash
demigod tier: sekai
a tier of their own: kingdinger
%%%%posters: sart and lendo.

They just get instantly deleted so no one bothers anymore.

Not to mention we now only have like 5 people using the board, so that's a problem too.
